   20: 
   21: -module(smoke_test_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: 
   25: %-compile(export_all).
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,
   27:     init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   28: 
   29: -export([boot_combo/1, native_atomics/1, jump_table/1]).
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]},
   33:         {timetrap, {minutes, 2}}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [boot_combo, native_atomics, jump_table].
   37: 
   38: init_per_testcase(boot_combo = Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   39:     case erlang:system_info(build_type) of
   40:         opt ->
   41:             init_per_tc(Case, Config);
   42:         _ ->
   43:             {skip, "Cannot test boot_combo in special builds since beam.* may not exist"}
   44:     end;
   45: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   46:     init_per_tc(Case, Config).
   47: 
   48: init_per_tc(Case, Config) ->
   49:     [{testcase, Case} | Config].
   50: 
   51: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   52:     erts_test_utils:ept_check_leaked_nodes(Config).
   53: 
   54: %%%
   55: %%% The test cases -------------------------------------------------------------
   56: %%%
   57: 
   58: boot_combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     NOOP = fun() -> ok end,
   60:     A42 = fun() ->
   61:         case erlang:system_info(threads) of
   62:             true ->
   63:                 42 = erlang:system_info(thread_pool_size);
   64:             false ->
   65:                 ok
   66:         end
   67:           end,
   68: 
   69:     chk_boot(["+Ktrue"], NOOP),
   70:     chk_boot(["+A42"], A42),
   71:     chk_boot(["+Ktrue", "+A42"], A42),
   72: 
   73:     WBTArgs = ["very_short", "short", "medium", "long", "very_long"],
   74:     WTArgs = ["very_low", "low", "medium", "high", "very_high"],
   75:     [chk_boot(["+sbwt", WBT,
   76:         "+sbwtdcpu", WBT,
   77:         "+sbwtdio", WBT,
   78:         "+swt", WT,
   79:         "+swtdcpu", WT,
   80:         "+swtdio", WT], NOOP) || WBT <- WBTArgs, WT <- WTArgs],
   81: 
   82:     WSArgs = ["legacy", "default"],
   83:     [chk_boot(["+sws", WS], NOOP) || WS <- WSArgs].
   84: 
   85: native_atomics(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     NA32Key = "32-bit native atomics",
   87:     NA64Key = "64-bit native atomics",
   88:     DWNAKey = "Double word native atomics",
   89:     EthreadInfo = erlang:system_info(ethread_info),
   90:     io:format("~p~n", [EthreadInfo]),
   91:     {value, {NA32Key, NA32, _}} = lists:keysearch(NA32Key, 1, EthreadInfo),
   92:     {value, {NA64Key, NA64, _}} = lists:keysearch(NA64Key, 1, EthreadInfo),
   93:     {value, {DWNAKey, DWNA, _}} = lists:keysearch(DWNAKey, 1, EthreadInfo),
   94:     case {erlang:system_info(build_type), NA32, NA64, DWNA} of
   95:         {opt, "no", "no", _} ->
   96:             ct:fail(optimized_smp_runtime_without_native_atomics);
   97:         _ ->
   98:             {comment,
   99:                     NA32 ++ " 32-bit, "
  100:                     ++ NA64 ++ " 64-bit, and "
  101:                     ++ DWNA ++ " double word native atomics"}
  102:     end.
  103: 
  104: jump_table(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     case erlang:system_info(beam_jump_table) of
  106:         true ->
  107:             ok;
  108:         false ->
  109:             case erlang:system_info(build_type) of
  110:                 opt ->
  111:                     ct:fail(optimized_without_beam_jump_table);
  112:                 BT ->
  113:                     {comment, "No beam jump table, but build type is " ++ atom_to_list(BT)}
  114:             end
  115:     end.
  116: 
  117: 
  118: %%%
  119: %%% Aux functions --------------------------------------------------------------
  120: %%%
  121: 
  122: chk_boot(Args, Fun) ->
  123:     Success = make_ref(),
  124:     Parent = self(),
  125:     io:format("--- Testing ~s~n", [lists:join(" ", Args)]),
  126:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(Args),
  127:     %% if spawn_link is used, race condition happens when
  128:     %%  remote process exits with 'noconnection' reason and fails
  129:     %%  the test case
  130:     Pid = spawn(Node, fun() ->
  131:         Fun(),
  132:         Parent ! {self(), Success}
  133:                            end),
  134:     receive
  135:         {Pid, Success} ->
  136:             Node = node(Pid),
  137:             peer:stop(Peer),
  138:             io:format("--- Success!~n", []),
  139:             ok
  140:     end.
  141: 
  142:
